bullets: comfortable: TypeScript/JavaScript, React 16.8+, Node.js, HTML/CSS, Git
prior experience: SQL, Go, Dart, Flutter, Electron, C++, C

children.title: Search Movie Quotes
bullets: Created and maintain web app with 147,000+ users
Reduced main js chunk size by implementing route-based dynamic imports, leading to 90% reduction in first-meaningful-paint time
Improved UX by rendering thousands of search results up to 140 times faster with virtualized lists
Designed and implemented RESTful API with authorized endpoints and rate limiting which encouraged users to create accounts and helped prevent API abuse respectively
Improved search relevance by implementing custom fuzzy search with highlight indices
Refactored 30+ components to use React Hooks API to improve code reuse and maintainability

children.title: SMQ Database Builder
bullets: Created Node.js CLI tool to parse .srt, xml, and .vtt files and build the database for SearchMovieQuotes.com
Migrated to TypeScript using good Object-Oriented practices and Test-Driven Development with Mocha and Chai
Streamlined tool by fetching .xml and chunked .vtt files from Netflix and Disney+ at runtime
Implemented custom Node.js wrappers for FFmpeg and ImageMagick to automatically generate compressed scrubbing thumbnails
Improved parser's ability to form complete sentences by developing data scrubbing rules that accommodate non-standardized video caption specifications

children.title: University of British Columbia
children.subtitle: Teaching Assistant, Models of Computation
bullets: Collaborated in a team of 13 TAs to support learning in a fast-paced summer course
Presented to a group of about 20 students 6 times a week
Developed a script to automate testing students' RegExp and graded assignments in a timely manner
